bioAsHtml:
As an early Java adopter, Joost has over 18 years of experience in building and designing Java applications at many different companies. He likes to learn about new technologies. From iOS programming, Mongo and Hadoop to Scala, Functional Programming and Akka. He came into contact with the Scala language over 4 years ago and has been enthusiastic ever since.

After working at several companies, Joost is now working as a contractor since 6 years. Joost is the organiser of the Brabant.Scala meetup group.

acceptedTalks.title: Fast Rest API building with Unfiltered

bio:
